title: varuvadu sonnEn
sahitya:
varuvadu sonnEn nAn paDuvadu paDuga nI vambu sei maDa manamE


anupallavi

  tiruvurum para shAntam tripulan peruvadO sekkum shivalingamum makku nAi arivadO


caraNam    uLLam tirundAviDil ulagam tirundumO uDalukku sOrinri Urukku virundAmO
kaLLa puruSanukkuk-kannikA dAnamO kANIyai uzhugAdu kaNDu kuDi mAnamO
